body: Normally I despise NTR as low tier trash… However I never gave the anime or manga a second of my time, seeing as its read either ironically, or by ugly delusional cucks who think that escorts actually love them. And now it’s come to my attention that this is basically canon, so now I’m laughing at both the mangakuck and the people who actually read that sht.
